statements: SELECT * FROM customers_segmentation WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customers_segmentation WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers_segmentation WHERE occupation = 'Engineer';
SELECT * FROM customers_segmentation WHERE behavior LIKE '%loyal%';
SELECT AVG(age) FROM customers_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM customers_segmentation;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, occupation, preferences FROM customers_segmentation WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM customers_segmentation WHERE location IN ('California', 'Texas');
SELECT MAX(age) FROM customers_segmentation WHERE behavior = 'Impulsive';
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM customers_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, occupation FROM customers_segmentation WHERE preferences = 'Outdoor Activities';
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customers_segmentation WHERE age < 25;
SELECT DISTINCT gender, occupation FROM customers_segmentation ORDER BY gender, occupation;
SELECT name, behavior, preferences FROM customers_segmentation WHERE location NOT LIKE '%texas%';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) FROM customers_segmentation;
SELECT customer_id, occupation, behavior FROM customers_segmentation WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY occupation;
SELECT AVG(age) FROM customers_segmentation WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM customers_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Female' AND behavior = 'Regular';
SELECT preferences FROM customers_segmentation WHERE occupation = 'Doctor';
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender, location, occupation FROM customers_segmentation;
SELECT * FROM customers_segmentation WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers_segmentation WHERE occupation = 'Engineer';
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender, location FROM customers_segmentation WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT name, location, preferences FROM customers_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Female' AND behavior = 'Active';
SELECT DISTINCT occupation FROM customers_segmentation;
SELECT name, location, preferences FROM customers_segmentation WHERE occupation IN ('Doctor', 'Lawyer');
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers_segmentation WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender FROM customers_segmentation WHERE preferences IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers_segmentation ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender FROM customers_segmentation ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM customers_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT SUM(age) AS total_age FROM customers_segmentation;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, location FROM customers_segmentation WHERE age > (SELECT AVG(age) FROM customers_segmentation);
SELECT customer_id, name, age, location FROM customers_segmentation WHERE occupation = (SELECT occupation FROM customers_segmentation WHERE name = 'John');
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) AS unique_locations FROM customers_segmentation;
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM customers_segmentation WHERE location <> 'London' AND behavior != 'Inactive';
SELECT * FROM customers_segmentation WHERE behavior = 'Aggressive' AND (location = 'Paris' OR location = 'Berlin');
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender FROM customers_segmentation WHERE customer_id LIKE 'a%' OR name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM customers_segmentation;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, age FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Segmentation;
SELECT customer_id, demographics FROM Segmentation;
SELECT segmentation_id, behavior FROM Segmentation;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, demographics FROM Segmentation WHERE behavior = 'Active';
SELECT name, age, location FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE location LIKE '%City';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, demographics FROM Segmentation ORDER BY segmentation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age >= 30;
SELECT name, location FROM Customers WHERE age <= 25 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE location LIKE '%Street%' AND age < 50;
SELECT customer_id, demographics FROM Segmentation WHERE preferences IS NULL;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Customers WHERE age < 50 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior FROM Segmentation WHERE demographics LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT name, age FROM Customers WHERE location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM Customers INNER JOIN Segmentation ON Customers.customer_id = Segmentation.customer_id WHERE Segmentation.behavior = 'High Spender'
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM Customers LEFT JOIN Segmentation ON Customers.customer_id = Segmentation.customer_id WHERE Segmentation.segmentation_id IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM Customers
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM Customers
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM Customers GROUP BY gender
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_segments FROM Segmentation GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Customers
SELECT customer_id, demographics, preferences FROM Segmentation WHERE behavior = 'Tech Enthusiast'
SELECT name, age, location FROM Customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT customer_id, name, age, location FROM Customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM Customers WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles')
SELECT customer_id, preferences FROM Segmentation WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customers WHERE age > 40)
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM Customers FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
SELECT customer_id, name, age, location FROM Customers OFFSET 10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
SELECT name, age, location FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM customers_demographics;
SELECT age, gender FROM customers_demographics WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT location FROM customers_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customers_behavior;
SELECT behavior_id, purchase_history FROM customers_behavior WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT interaction_count FROM customers_behavior WHERE behavior_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM customers_preferences;
SELECT product_interest, discount_preference FROM customers_preferences WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers_demographics JOIN customers_behavior ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customers_behavior.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers_behavior JOIN customers_demographics ON customers_behavior.customer_id = customers_demographics.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers_demographics JOIN customers_preferences ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customers_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history, product_interest FROM customers_behavior JOIN customers_preferences ON customers_behavior.customer_id = customers_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, age, purchase_history FROM customers_demographics JOIN customers_behavior ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customers_behavior.customer_id WHERE age < 40;

SELECT customers_demographics.customer_id, customers_behavior.purchase_history, customers_preferences.discount_preference FROM customers_demographics JOIN customers_behavior ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customers_behavior.customer_id JOIN customers_preferences ON customers_behavior.customer_id = customers_preferences.customer_id WHERE age < 50;
SELECT * FROM customers_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM customers_demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, age, location from customers_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_count, product_interest FROM customers_behavior JOIN customers_preferences ON customers_behavior.customer_id = customers_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers_preferences WHERE discount_preference = TRUE;

SELECT customer_id, interaction_count, discount_preference FROM customers_behavior JOIN customers_preferences ON customers_behavior.customer_id = customers_preferences.customer_id WHERE interaction_count > 5;

SELECT customer_id, interaction_count, discount_preference FROM customers_behavior JOIN customers_preferences ON customers_behavior.customer_id = customers_preferences.customer_id WHERE discount_preference = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customers_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history, interaction_count FROM customers_behavior WHERE interaction_count > 50
SELECT customer_id, age, location, product_interest FROM customers_demographics JOIN customers_preferences ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customers_preferences.customer_id
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, purchase_history FROM customers_demographics JOIN customers_behavior ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customers_behavior.customer_id

SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, purchase_history, discount_preference FROM customers_demographics JOIN customers_behavior ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customers_behavior.customer_id JOIN customers_preferences ON customers_behavior.customer_id = customers_preferences.customer_id
SELECT customer_id, gender, product_interest FROM customers_preferences WHERE discount_preference = TRUE
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customers_demographics
SELECT SUM(interaction_count) AS total_interactions FROM customers_behavior
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM customers_demographics
SELECT MAX(interaction_count) AS max_interactions FROM customers_behavior
SELECT MIN(age) AS min_age FROM customers_demographics
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customers_behavior WHERE behavior_id IN (SELECT MAX(behavior_id) FROM customers_behavior)
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customers_demographics WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers_preferences WHERE product_interest = 'Electronics')
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customers_demographics WHERE gender = (SELECT gender FROM customers_demographics WHERE customer_id = 1)
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customers_demographics WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers_preferences)
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customers_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customers_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customers_demographics WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM customers_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customers_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customers_demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT behavior_id, customer_id FROM customers_behavior;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customers_behavior WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT preference_id, preferred_brand FROM customers_preferences WHERE preferred_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, preferred_brand, preferred_category FROM customers_preferences WHERE preferred_brand = 'Apple';
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments;
SELECT segment_id, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customers_demographics JOIN customers_behavior ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customers_behavior.customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customers_demographics JOIN customers_behavior ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customers_behavior.customer_id JOIN customers_preferences ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customers_preferences.customer_id;

SELECT customers_demographics.customer_id, customers_demographics.age, customers_behavior.purchase_history FROM customers_demographics LEFT JOIN customers_behavior ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customers_behavior.customer_id;
SELECT behavior_id, customer_id, purchase_history FROM customers_behavior WHERE purchase_history->'$.total_purchase_amount' > 1000;
SELECT preference_id, preferred_brand, preferred_category FROM customers_preferences WHERE preferred_category LIKE '%Clothing%';
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, segment_name FROM customers_demographics JOIN customer_segments ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customer_segments.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM customers_demographics UNION SELECT * FROM customers_behavior;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customers_demographics WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers_behavior);
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customers_demographics WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers_behavior WHERE browsing_history->'$.product_category' = 'Electronics');
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customers_demographics WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers_behavior);

SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customers_demographics WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers_behavior WHERE browsing_history->'$.product_category' = 'Electronics');
SELECT * FROM customers_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customers_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM customers_demographics;
SELECT * FROM customers_behavior WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customers_behavior WHERE JSON_LENGTH(purchase_history) > 5;
SELECT customer_id, browsing_history FROM customers_behavior WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(browsing_history, '{"site": "example.com"}');
SELECT customer_id, preferred_brand FROM customers_preferences WHERE preferred_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, preferred_category FROM customers_preferences WHERE preferred_brand IN ('Apple', 'Samsung');
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE 'Premium%';
SELECT segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 3;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.age, b.purchase_history, p.preferred_brand FROM customers_demographics c JOIN customers_behavior b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id JOIN customers_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.age, b.browsing_history, p.preferred_category FROM customers_demographics c LEFT JOIN customers_behavior b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id JOIN customers_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.gender, b.purchase_history, p.preferred_brand FROM customers_demographics c JOIN customers_behavior b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id LEFT JOIN customers_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.location, b.purchase_history, p.preferred_category FROM customers_demographics c JOIN customers_behavior b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id LEFT JOIN customers_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.age, p.preferred_brand, s.segment_name FROM customers_demographics c JOIN customers_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN customer_segments s ON c.segment_id = s.segment_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.age, p.preferred_category, s.segment_name FROM customers_demographics c JOIN customers_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN customer_segments s ON c.segment_id = s.segment_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.location, p.preferred_brand, s.segment_description FROM customers_demographics c JOIN customers_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN customer_segments s ON c.segment_id = s.segment_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.gender, p.preferred_category, s.segment_description FROM customers_demographics c JOIN customers_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN customer_segments s ON c.segment_id = s.segment_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.age, p.preferred_brand, s.segment_description FROM customers_demographics c JOIN customers_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN customer_segments s ON c.segment_id = s.segment_id WHERE c.age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM customers_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customers_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, education_level FROM customers_demographics WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT customer_id, last_login FROM customer_behavior WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history->'total_purchases' AS total_purchases FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE marketing_opt_in = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, favorite_categories FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_categories->'primary' = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM targeted_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM targeted_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-03-01';
SELECT campaign_id, target_audience->'age_group' AS age_group FROM targeted_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, total_clicks FROM campaign_performance WHERE total_clicks >= 100;
SELECT campaign_id, total_conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE total_conversions <= 50;

SELECT customers_demographics.customer_id, customer_behavior.last_login, customer_preferences.marketing_opt_in FROM customers_demographics INNER JOIN customer_behavior ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customer_behavior.customer_id INNER JOIN customer_preferences ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id;

SELECT customers_demographics.customer_id, customers_demographics.age, customer_behavior.purchase_history->>'total_purchases' AS total_purchases, customer_preferences.favorite_categories->'primary' AS primary_category FROM customers_demographics INNER JOIN customer_behavior ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customer_behavior.customer_id INNER JOIN customer_preferences ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id;

SELECT targeted_campaigns.campaign_id, targeted_campaigns.campaign_name, campaign_performance.total_clicks, campaign_performance.total_conversions FROM targeted_campaigns INNER JOIN campaign_performance ON targeted_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance.campaign_id;

SELECT customers_demographics.customer_id, customers_demographics.gender, customer_preferences.marketing_opt_in, targeted_campaigns.start_date, targeted_campaigns.end_date, campaign_performance.total_clicks, campaign_performance.total_conversions FROM customers_demographics INNER JOIN customer_preferences ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id INNER JOIN targeted_campaigns ON customers_demographics.customer_id = targeted_campaigns.customer_id INNER JOIN campaign_performance ON targeted_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance.campaign_id;

SELECT customers_demographics.customer_id, customers_demographics.location, customer_behavior.last_login, customer_preferences.favorite_categories, targeted_campaigns.target_audience, campaign_performance.total_clicks FROM customers_demographics INNER JOIN customer_behavior ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customer_behavior.customer_id INNER JOIN customer_preferences ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id INNER JOIN targeted_campaigns ON customers_demographics.customer_id = targeted_campaigns.customer_id INNER JOIN campaign_performance ON targeted_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance.campaign_id;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, education_level FROM customers_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history, last_login FROM customer_behavior WHERE last_login >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, favorite_categories, marketing_opt_in FROM customer_preferences WHERE marketing_opt_in = true;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_audience FROM targeted_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE total_clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers_demographics INNER JOIN customer_behavior ON customers_demographics.customer_id = customer_behavior.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences LEFT JOIN targeted_campaigns ON customer_preferences.customer_id = targeted_campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM customers_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, education_level FROM customers_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history, last_login FROM customer_behavior WHERE JSON_LENGTH(purchase_history) > 0;
SELECT customer_id, favorite_categories, marketing_opt_in FROM customer_preferences WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(favorite_categories, '"Electronics"');
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_audience FROM targeted_campaigns WHERE JSON_SEARCH(target_audience, 'one', 'Millennials') IS NOT NULL;
SELECT campaign_id, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE total_conversions > total_clicks * 0.1;
SELECT * FROM customers_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE DATE(last_login) = CURDATE();
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, target_audience FROM targeted_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, education_level FROM customers_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male' AND location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM customers_demographics;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customers_demographics;
SELECT SUM(total_conversions) AS total_conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id = 100;
SELECT campaign_id, total_clicks, total_conversions, (total_conversions * 100 / total_clicks) AS conversion_rate FROM campaign_performance WHERE total_clicks > 0;
